headline: CNN Special Reports
subHeadline: All The Best, All The Worst 2024; Donald Trump Won the 2024 Election; Women Dominates Music Industry. Aired 5a-5:30 ET

utterances.speaker: TOM FOREMAN, CNN HOST
utterances.sentences: Hold on tight. 2024 was a crazy, reckless, risky ride with surprises at every turn, where every rough road led to another. And we're taking a look back at that long, strange trip with our panelists. Roy Wood Jr., Brianna Keilar, Boris Sanchez, Kyung Lah, Omar Jimenez, Pamela Brown, and John Berman.It's All the Best, All the Worst 2024 Coast to Coast. Welcome, I'm Tom Foreman. And while every year is a unique journey, the past 12 months took us on an epically bumpy ride through big news entertainment, sports, music, pop culture, and of course, where we begin on the roughest road of all. The biggest, best, worst political story of the year was the titanic fight for the White House between sitting President Joe Biden and former President Donald Trump. (BEGIN VIDEO CLIP) BRIANNA KEILAR, CO-ANCHOR, CNN: Unbelievable. ROY WOOD JR., COMEDIAN: This year was the year of battle.

utterances.speaker: PAMELA BROWN, CNN SENIOR WASHINGTON CORRESPONDENT
utterances.sentences: Both sides felt like the other side represented the end of America, right?DONALD TRUMP, PRESIDENT-ELECT OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA: He's done a poor job.

utterances.speaker: JOE BIDEN, PRESIDENT OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
utterances.sentences: What were you talking about?

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Worst reality. Even as bitter words flew between the oldest presidential candidates ever, polls showed most voters didn't like either choice.

utterances.speaker: JOHN BERMAN, CNN ANCHOR
utterances.sentences: It was the election that nobody asked for, and everyone was getting. And they were getting it every day at full volume.

utterances.speaker: KYUNG LAH, CNN SENIOR INVESTIGATIVE CORRESPONDENT
utterances.sentences: If this were a dating show, you'd want to walk off the set. [05

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: The twice impeached Trump rode in on an avalanche of legal cases over classified documents, election meddling, sexual misconduct, ordered to pay hundreds of millions for his misdeeds, and still stewing about his election loss in 2020.

utterances.speaker: OMAR JIMENEZ, CNN CORRESPONDENT
utterances.sentences: A lot happened fast and I can't even remember how things have happened.

utterances.speaker: JAKE TAPPER, CNN HOST
utterances.sentences: Former President Donald J. Trump convicted of 34 felony charges.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Worst legal moment for the former president, being convicted for dozens of felony counts tied to a hush money payments to a porn star.

utterances.speaker: TRUMP
utterances.sentences: As far as the trial itself, it was very unfair.WOOD JR.: Donald Trump is the first president I've ever seen who do the scandals then get elected. You did it wrong. You're supposed to get elected. Then you run the scams.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: But the GOP barely blinked. Trump blew through the field of would-be challengers and secured his party's nomination with ease.

utterances.speaker: JIMENEZ
utterances.sentences: Yes, the Republicans had every chance to change their course from Trump politics, and they didn't.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Biden had his own problems. Concern about his age, immigration, and inflation fatigue.

utterances.speaker: BROWN
utterances.sentences: I'm from Kentucky, and I was talking to a lot of people from home who maybe didn't love Donald Trump, but they weren't happy about the prices at the grocery store.

utterances.speaker: BERMAN
utterances.sentences: The bottom line, the headwinds that Joe Biden was facing were just huge.

utterances.speaker: TAPPER
utterances.sentences: We're live from Georgia, a key battleground state in the race for the White House.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Then came the worst debate for Democrats. While Trump rolled out a torrent of falsehoods, Biden sputtered, muttered.

utterances.speaker: BIDEN
utterances.sentences: Look, if we finally beat Medicare?

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: And teed up the best line of the evening for his opponent.

utterances.speaker: TRUMP
utterances.sentences: I really don't know what he said at the end of that sentence. I don't think he knows what he said either.

utterances.speaker: BORIS SANCHEZ, CNN ANCHOR
utterances.sentences: My jaw dropped to the ground. And you knew right then that the shape of this race was going to change.

utterances.speaker: TRUMP
utterances.sentences: Take a look at what happened. FOREMANTrump's life in Pennsylvania, which left one person dead, two critically injured, and the candidate bloodied. The tragedy set up a triumphant Republican National Convention.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: I said, Trump mania from wild brother. Let Trump mania rule again. Let Trump mania make America, great again!

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Under intense pressure amid bad polling, Biden dropped out.

utterances.speaker: BIDEN
utterances.sentences: America is going to have to choose between moving forward or backward, between hope and hate.

utterances.speaker: KEILAR
utterances.sentences: If someone had written that into a script, we as political journalists would say that's not how it works.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Just like that, Vice President Kamala Harris was the new Democratic nominee and her party's best chance for a do-over.

utterances.speaker: LAH
utterances.sentences: So, there was this swell of excitement from pop culture. You know, Kamala is brat, right?

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: As Trump stumbled.

utterances.speaker: TRUMP
utterances.sentences: I didn't know she was black until a number of years ago when she happened to turn black.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Harris rode rising polls, anger over abortion restrictions, and she racked up big-name supporters eager to trump on Trump.

utterances.speaker: MICHELLE OBAMA, FORMER FIRST LADY OF THE UNITED STATES
utterances.sentences: Who's going to tell him that the job he's currently seeking might just be one of those black jobs?(APPLAUSE) WOOD JR.: Kamala definitely had a lot of momentum. She had the money. She had the popularity.

utterances.speaker: BERMAN
utterances.sentences: Look, it was clear at the beginning that Donald Trump did not know how to run against Vice President Harris.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: In the second presidential debate, V.P. Harris lured Trump into the worst lie about immigrants.

utterances.speaker: TRUMP
utterances.sentences: They're eating the cats. They're eating -- they're eating the pets of the people that live there.

utterances.speaker: LAH
utterances.sentences: It's something that such trope that has been repeated so often in history about people of color that it was astonishing to hear it come out of his mouth.

utterances.speaker: TRUMP
utterances.sentences: I will appoint a real special prosecutor.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: But Trump came storming back, flooding the campaign with fear and falsehoods while promising pardons for many January 6th rioters. TRUMP

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Slipping past what officials say was a second assassination attempt, although the accused man denies it, and raging at anyone who backed Harris.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Kamala is for they, them. President Trump is for you.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Harris fought to the wire.

utterances.speaker: KAMALA HARRIS, VICE PRESIDENT OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
utterances.sentences: It doesn't have to be this way.

utterances.speaker: KEILAR
utterances.sentences: But it was a tall order to pull off a campaign in that amount of time.

utterances.speaker: JIMENEZ
utterances.sentences: So, when you got to election night, really no one knew what was going to happen.

utterances.speaker: BERMAN
utterances.sentences: It is now official CNN projects that Donald Trump has been elected president defeating Vice President Kamala Harris.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Four years after losing the presidency, Trump reclaimed it, a feat not seen since Grover Cleveland in 1892.

utterances.speaker: LAH
utterances.sentences: There is something about him that speaks to America, and we have to understand that.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Republicans romped, taking the Senate, holding the House, while critics howled about a conservative plan they thought might trash government as we know it.

utterances.speaker: SANCHEZ
utterances.sentences: And yet there were so many people out there that felt like that very structure, that very system, those very institutions had failed them.

utterances.speaker: BROWN
utterances.sentences: And I think that's a big reason why Donald Trump won.

utterances.speaker: HARRIS
utterances.sentences: While I concede this election, I do not concede the fight.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Democrats did the best thing they could, pledging themselves to a peaceful transfer of power. Even as the election crushed hopes, the legal system might hold Trump accountable.

utterances.speaker: BROWN
utterances.sentences: Many of them still feel this way, that Donald Trump back in the White House represents the end of democracy.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: The wildest promotion.

utterances.speaker: TRUMP
utterances.sentences: I'm proud to endorse and encourage you to get this Bible. FOREMANWOOD JR.: If you'd have told me 15 years ago that Donald Trump would be the president and he would be selling gold sneakers to black people, I would have just called you crazy.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: After his win, Trump began rolling out a raft of controversial cabinet picks and advisors, many who have echoed his calls to go after his critics.

utterances.speaker: BERMAN
utterances.sentences: He went for loyalists. He went for people who would break things.

utterances.speaker: LAH
utterances.sentences: There should be no surprise.

utterances.speaker: SANCHEZ
utterances.sentences: Trump's promise throughout his campaign and especially towards the end was one of retribution and revenge.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Of course, with some of his picks immediately running into troubles, it's hardly a done deal.

utterances.speaker: JIMENEZ
utterances.sentences: We haven't even gotten to the confirmation process where all eyes are on these candidates.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: What's more, when the popular vote was fully counted, it showed Trump won. But he fell short of 50 percent and had one of the smallest winning margins in a half century.

utterances.speaker: KEILAR
utterances.sentences: That's going to bother him.

utterances.speaker: SANCHEZ
utterances.sentences: It's a clear victory. But stop using the word landslide.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Still, some Republican lawmakers are eager to do whatever the next president wants.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: If Donald Trump says jump three feet high and scratch your head, we all jump three feet high and scratch our heads.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Even as the opposition races to keep pushing back hard.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: We will push back against far-right extremism whenever necessary.(END VIDEO CLIP)

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Sit tight, we have so much more ahead, including the best movies and music, the perils of unlimited shrimp, and heads up!

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: It's launching!

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: In music, the best beats came from the brats as Charli XCXhad everyone doing the Apple dance.

utterances.speaker: KEILAR
utterances.sentences: Is that that's a good thing I take it.

utterances.speaker: BERMAN
utterances.sentences: No, I have no idea. I have like no idea.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Chappell Roan was smoking at the Video Music Awards, Ariana Grande kept cool, and Billie Eilish took flight again.

utterances.speaker: JIMENEZ
utterances.sentences: Look, the pop women this year, I feel like really brought it.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Sabrina Carpenter not only had hits, but also gets our award for the best tour for an artist not named Taylor Swift.

utterances.speaker: LAH
utterances.sentences: She really blew up this year. I really, really like her. My daughter loves her, but enough with the espresso.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: In rap, Kendrick Lamar gave the best beat down to his old rival Drake.

utterances.speaker: SANCHEZ
utterances.sentences: It's a diss track and it's a vicious one at that. And yet it has this amazing beat that you can dance to.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: And he rolled out a surprise new album to the delight of fans.

utterances.speaker: JIMENEZ
utterances.sentences: It's unbelievable.

utterances.speaker: WOOD
utterances.sentences: I don't know if anyone had a better year musically than Kendrick Lamar.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: It was a big year for country with hot hits from Shaboozey, Post Malone.

utterances.speaker: KEILAR
utterances.sentences: Post Malone was everywhere this year. Post Malone is actually one of the artists that I listen to a lot.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Dasha too.

utterances.speaker: BROWN
utterances.sentences: I do not like country music. Can you believe that?

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: But the biggest, boldest, best move on the country charts came from pop star Beyonce with Cowboy Carter.

utterances.speaker: BERMAN
utterances.sentences: It's all sort of wildly popular country, and hip hop, and pop, and rock. They all blend in certain ways now that maybe they didn't 20, 30 years ago.

utterances.speaker: LAH
utterances.sentences: It was so much fun to watch this budding romance, you know. I mean, who would have ever even heard of Like the NFL until Taylor Swift came along?

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: And proving once again, it's good to be the queen.Let's turn now from gold records to the silver screen. Out in Hollywood, superhero flicks have dominated the box office for quite some time, but this year, the movies went in a cartoonish direction. (BEGIN VIDEO CLIP)

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Look, we all have a job to do. I plan for the future.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: You want to sit with us?

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: These girls are so cool.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: "Inside Out 2" made more than $1 billion in less than three weeks.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Hey.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: The fastest any animated movie has ever hit that milestone.

utterances.speaker: KEILAR
utterances.sentences: When I was a kid, where were the movies teaching us about our feelings?

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: And the list of top money makers was crowded with more of the same. The minions reappeared in "Despicable Me 4."

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: We need volunteers. Nice work, gentlemen.

utterances.speaker: BERMAN
utterances.sentences: There should be dozens of "Despicable Me's," as far as I'm concerned. Minions are always exciting.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: You were chosen to become something more than you already are.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: "Kung Fu Panda" showed off his moves again.

utterances.speaker: LAH
utterances.sentences: I'm done with the "Kung Fu Panda's." Like, stop. Stop already.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: This is a call from the ancestors. To sail to new skies. FOREMANWOOD JR.: The same karaoke, the same concert. Shut your ass up.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: I don't know why you are so greedy for it in this one.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Big budget spectacles had their moments, including the long- awaited "Gladiator 2."

utterances.speaker: BROWN
utterances.sentences: "Gladiator 2," I can't wait to see and I'm going to make it work because "Gladiator 1" is my favorite movie of all time.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: This is a form of power that our world has not yet seen. The ultimate power.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Best visuals with breathtaking scenes and out of this world action, the winner has to be "Dune, Part 2."

utterances.speaker: JIMENEZ
utterances.sentences: That's what you want. That's what you want. And for me, that is what defined my movie experience.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: "Deadpool and Wolverine" managed to keep superheroes in the mix.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: I have no idea how to save it alone. But you, you know how to save it.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Spoiler alert.

utterances.speaker: BERMAN
utterances.sentences: It turned out it was fairly violent.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: In straight drama, the worst anxiety came from Civil War.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: There's some kind of misunderstanding here.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: What?

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: You're American.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: It also had the best line of the year.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Okay. What kind of American are you?

utterances.speaker: SANCHEZ
utterances.sentences: That is really a Rorschach test for where you sit politically. What you see in it tells you more about yourself than the actual movie.WOOD JR.: The last time those two met up, it was almost the end of Kong.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Of course, "Godzilla and Kong" raged again and --

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Sometimes the old ways are better than the new.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: The bigger, better, faster sequel to the "Twister" franchise sucked in a huge audience.

utterances.speaker: KEILAR
utterances.sentences: I thought the plot was very good. I thought the special effects were excellent. I thought the soundtrack was very good. If I'm being honest with you though, I think Glen Powell is a hottie.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Come on, Mike, slow down!

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: We are late.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Who is this Santa? He's scaring my kid.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Yes. He's scaring me too.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: In horror, all the good little kids went to see "Terrifier 3." All the Oscar watchers grabbed onto the substance.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: There's been a slight misuse of the substance.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: In comedy, give a hand to "The Fall Guy."

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: You're a stuntman. Nobody's going to notice you. That's your job. No offense.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: I mean, sun taking.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: And "Beetlejuice Beetlejuice" conjured up giggles too.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Feel free to express yourselves. Don't be afraid.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: You're a figment of my imagination.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Really?

utterances.speaker: SANCHEZ
utterances.sentences: Michael Keaton is a genius, and I enjoyed watching it.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Best Magical Moments, "Wicked" is the winner.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: You have no real power.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: That's why I need you.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Don't let her get away this wicked witch.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: And even with several movies making late Oscar bids, we've already picked a strong contender for best film.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: This is a conclave, Aldo. It's not a war. UNKNOWN

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: "Conclave" is a modern masterpiece and a hit with papal people everywhere.(END VIDEO CLIP)

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: The world of big news seemed almost cinematic this year, full of such drama and explosive events, so when we come back, we will take a look. Plus, we'll have the best moments in sports, the cutest lost penguin.(BEGIN VIDEO CLIP)

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Pretty, pretty cute.
